alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 11:55AM EST until March 12 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Driftwood River near Edinburgh. Flatrock River near Columbus. Sugar Creek near Edinburgh. East Fork White River at Seymour. East Fork White River near Rivervale. East Fork White River at Columbus. East Fork White River at Williams. .Minor flooding is ongoing or expected along the main stem rivers across central Indiana along with several smaller tributaries. Rainfall of 1.5 to 3 inches fell over the course of Friday March 3rd which has brought the widespread flooding to the area. Flooding is ongoing along the full length of the Wabash River with levels rising. Flooding along the White river is from Anderson to Hazleton with the crest near Anderson. Flooding along the East Fork White river is expected from Columbus to Williams with river levels rising along the full length of the river. Flooding along smaller tributaries will end by Sunday with flooding continuing through the week along much of the Wabash, White, and East Fork White rivers. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT TO SUNDAY, MARCH 12... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Williams. * WHEN...From late Sunday night to Sunday, March 12. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Campground begins to flood at Williams Dam. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday morning to a crest of 9.5 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
